3D CSS talks

12 Mar 2013

Since I’ve been using 3D CSS quite a lot on Foldable.me, I figured I should perhaps share some of my experiences by giving a presentation about it.

So my first ever conference talk was in October 2012 at FOWA in London. After my talk I sat down with Martha from Awwwards who wanted to interview me about the technology behind Foldable.me. You can find the interview on the Awwwards blog.

Sadly there was no video of my talk at FOWA publicly available, so there was only one thing I could do… So in January 2013 I went off to TakeOff Conf in Lille to give another talk about 3D CSS. This one was recorded and published for free, so here it is:
